1220130.name: GameAssistant: The Tool For Every Gamer - Special Edition
1220130.description:
Upgrades GameAssistant: The Tool For Every Gamer to Special Edition.

Special Edition brings support for multiple accounts.
So you don't need to purchase program on each account.

Special Edition also brings dark theme and PNG screenshots manager.

Additionally you will see thanks on title bar.
So if you like our program and want to show your appreciation,
please consider buying Special Edition :)

Please note, that some program features are disabled for accounts
other than the one which owns the program and this DLC.

These features are:
- install game
- launch game
- kill game process
- tweak that modifies CPU affinity (less than 10% games)
- tweak that modifies process priority (less than 2% games)
